    kNOw Plans Promoter Licenses

    Edit me

    License Types

    Community Developer

    Promote fundraisers, membership and causes of non-profit community development organizations.

    Learn More

    Small Business Promoter

    For event promoters and marketing professionals that promote at a max of 3 simultaneous locations in a single day.

    Learn More

    Franchised Corporate Promoter

    For marketing managers and directors of larger corporations promoting full franchised marketing campaigns.

    Learn More

    Impulse Alerts

    Add-on to a promoter license the ability to reach out to customers as they drive/walk-by the promoter's event.

    Learn More
